Megaton flinched back at Iron Raptors directness. "I assure you Iron Raptor=
. there is no need for such hostility, If you don't like my offer than perh=
aps there is some way you could profit from an arangement. The mutant wasn'=
t going to take no for an answer, "I'm a reasonable leader willing to liste=
n to any suggestion you have to make this work."


      From:  Yanshosh@a.=
..
      Date:  Fri Mar 23, 2001 6:05am
      Subject:  Re: Megaton at the =
CF

     
::Iron Raptor::

Iron Raptor's eyes narrow at the mention of lett=
ing Predacons use the 
CR chambers.

"There will be no Predacons inside the=
 CF, or any other Maximal 
base," she says forcefully. "If you want a cease=
-fire, fine. Anything 
else, and you may leave now."

She could sence Prowl=
's approval for declining the shared usage of 
facilities, but also sensed =
that he didn't think that her second 
comment was very curteous. But that d=
idn't matter. She was leader 
here, and curteous or not, she wasn't going t=
o let Predacons rampage 
through the Cybertronian Fire.
